details.description: Provides UK businesses with free, quick and easy access to a directory of approved finance suppliers
details.body: Business Finance for You brings into one place a wide range of finance providers across Britain - including business angels, regional funds, government schemes and banks - enabling businesses to more easily seek the finance they require. Its free and easy-to-use search engine allows businesses to refine searches according to their geographic location, the industry in which they operate, the amount of finance they require, and the life stage of their business.
details.short_description: Provides UK businesses with free, quick and easy access to a directory of approved finance suppliers
details.additional_information: Business Finance For You has been developed in association with the BBA, CDFA, the UK Business Angels Association, ABFA, FLA, British Chamber of Commerce, Forum of Private Business and the Department for Business Innovation and Skills.
